com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

Class CustomQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.QueryBuilder
      • com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.CustomQueryBuilder

  • public final class CustomQueryBuilder
extends QueryBuilder
    An utility class to construct a query on custom attribute parameter(s), applying one or more conditions. All conditions are case insensitive.

    To create a query of one custom attribute parameter, for example:

    new CustomQueryBuilder(Condition.EXACT_MATCH, "shopping", "car");

    To create a custom attribute query with multiple condition(s), add more conditions with the Operation specified, like below:

    new CustomQueryBuilder(Condition.EXACT_MATCH, "shopping", "car"). addCondition(Operation.OR, Condition.EXACT_MATCH, "performing arts", "opera").

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomQueryBuilder

        public CustomQueryBuilder(QueryBuilder.Condition condition,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Public Constructor.

        Creates a query with one condition.

        Parameters:
        condition - One of the values in Condition that describes the filter to be applied on the attribute with name when the specified value satisfies the condition.
        name - A String representing the name of the custom attribute to apply the condition filter.
        value - A String representing the filter value to be applied on the attribute specified in name.

    • Method Detail

      • addCondition

        public CustomQueryBuilder addCondition(QueryBuilder.Operation operation,
                                       QueryBuilder.Condition condition,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String value)
        Add a condition to the custom attribute query.
        Parameters:
        operation - One of the values in Operation that describes the logical operation between this conditions and the condition this is appended to.
        condition - One of the values in Condition that describes the filter to be applied on the attribute with name when the specified value satisfies the condition.
        name - A String representing the name of the custom attribute to apply the condition filter.
        value - A String representing the filter value to be applied on the attribute specified in name.
        Returns:
        The modified QueryBuilder itself.
